mapper.select: select a.id, a.actorName from t_actor a inner join t_film_actor fa on a.id = fa.actorId where fa.filmId = #{filmId}
select d.id, d.directorName from t_director d inner join t_film_director fd on d.id = fd.directorId where fd.filmId = #{filmId}

select f.id,f.name,f.listImgUrl,f.country,f.language,f.year,f.createTime,f.integration,f.thumbUp,f.thumbDown,f.status from t_film f where date(f.createTime) = ( SELECT date(createTime) FROM t_film WHERE id = (SELECT max(id) FROM t_film where status = 'on') ) and f.status = 'on'

select f.id,f.name,f.listImgUrl,f.country,f.language,f.year,f.createTime,f.integration,f.thumbUp,f.thumbDown,f.status from t_film f inner join t_film_evaluate e on e.id = f.id and e.recommend = true where f.status = 'on'

select f.id,f.name,f.listImgUrl,f.country,f.language,f.year,f.createTime,f.integration,f.thumbUp,f.thumbDown,f.status from t_film f inner join (select substring_index(substring_index(l.params,':',-1),'}',1) as filmId, count(l.params) as cnt from t_system_operation_log l where l.module = 'film' and l.operType = 'play' and l.operateTime > date_sub(now(), interval 30 day) group by l.params order by count(l.params) desc) t on f.id = t.filmId where f.status = 'on'
select count(1) from t_system_operation_log sol where sol.module = 'film' and sol.operType = 'play' and sol.params like concat('%:',#{filmId},'}%')
select t.country from ( select distinct f.country from t_film f ) t where t.country is not null
select t.language from ( select distinct f.language from t_film f ) t where t.language is not null
select t.year from ( select distinct f.year from t_film f ) t where t.year is not null order by t.year desc
